attributes.action: Petition's that get taken seriously and do what the people want
attributes.additional_details: these epetitions are not being delt with in a serious manner we said we want a referrendum on the EU the Government refused we said no to 70 million population refused and ignored deport foreign criminals unable. judges not doing there jobs ignored capital punishment refused british jbos for british workers refused everything is always turned down it seems pointless making petitions which also get refused more foreigners more muslims more enthics more benfits more housing more jobs gone how is immigration doing any favors
